data.title: Gibberish
data.statement:
Given an input string, [[S]], reprint it with its reverse intertwined within the original.
For example, given [[S]] = <<Holiday>> the output should be <<HyoaldiidlaoyH>>.

data.inputDescription: 1 line containing a single string (the source string [[S]])
data.outputDescription: 1 line containing a single string (the answer)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given an input string, S, reprint it with its reverse intertwined within the original.
For example, given S = Holiday the output should be HyoaldiidlaoyH.
Input
1 line containing a single string (the source string S)
Output
1 line containing a single string (the answer)
Constraints
0 <= length(S) < 1000
Example
Input
Holiday
Output
HyoaldiidlaoyH
